release_notes.en-US: - Disable the addon for Thunderbird 91, as support for the header is now included in Thunderbird itself (#12)

release_notes.en-US:
4.0.0:
 - now requires at least Thunderbird 78
 - fixed incompatibility with Thunderbird 78

4.0.1:
 - fixed Thunderbird stopping to respond if an eml file with an invalid format is opened
 - fixed add-on sometimes not working at start

 - fixed incompatibility with Thunderbird 52

- use the from address to select the sending identity
 - now also works with line endings other than CRLF
